text: Ani mi tya vastuce ka mhanuna bhaya rakhave jila tumhi allahaca sahabhagi tharavile ahe, vastavika tumhi tya vastula allahaca sahabhagi banavinyapasuna bhita nahi, jyace tumacyajavala allahane ekhade pramana utaravile nahi. Maga ya donhi samuhammadhye kona santica jasta hakkadara ahe, jara tumhi janata asala
